item.title: NAVER Data Lab
item.description:
Research Intern, NAVER Corp., Seongnam, South Korea, Jan 2020 - Feb 2020

  • Received an internship offer from NAVER as the prize winner of NAVER DSC 2019
  • Proposed a novel approach to visualize the evolution of buzzwords at Data Lab

item.title: NAVER Finance
item.description:
Excellence Prize, NAVER Data Science Competition, Aug 2019

  • Predicted suspension of dividend payments with domestic stock price data over the past 10 years, using a Cox proportional hazard (PH) model with time-varying covariates
  • Received an internship offer from NAVER as the prize winner

item.title: Embrain Panel Data
item.description:
Excellence Prize, Embrain Panel Big Data Competition, May 2019

  • Performed competition analysis on customer behavior data obtained from Macromill Embrain Panel
  • Used a nested logistic regression model to make comparisons within and out of game genres
